Translation of the colophon of al-Risālah al-jāmiʻah li-khamsat ashyāʼ: "Risālat Kull al-lughāt is completed."

record.title: Treatises on magic, the occult and Arabic grammar : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit of Shams al-maʻārif wa-laṭāʼif al-ʻawārif: "Huwa Allāh. al-Faṣl al-khāmis ʻashar: Fī al-shurūṭ al-lāzimah li-baʻḍ dūna baʻḍ fī al-bidāyāt wa-al-nihāyāt ..."
Secundo folio of Shams al-maʻārif wa-laṭāʼif al-ʻawārif: wa-buwujūd ghayrihā māhīyatuhu.

Incipit of al-Kāfiyah: "Kāfiyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, wa-hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf, li-annahā immā an tadulla ʻalá maʻná fī nafsihā aw lā. al-Thānī al-ḥarf, wa-al-awwal immā an yaqtarina bi-aḥad al-azminah al-thalāthah aw lā ..."
Secundo folio of al-Kāfiyah: al-thānī al-ism wa-al-awwal al-fiʻl.

Incipit of Iẓhār al-asrār fī al-naḥw: "Iẓhār lil-Burkawī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn, wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah fīmā yaḥtāju ilayhi kull muʻrib ashadd al-iḥtiyāj wa-huwa thalāthat ashyāʼ: al-ʻĀmil wa-al-maʻmūl wa-al-ʻamal, ay, al-iʻrāb, fa-wajaba tartībuhā ʻalá thalāthat abwāb. al-Bāb al-awwal fī al-ʻāmil ..."
Secundo folio of Iẓhār al-asrār fī al-naḥw: mā dalla bi-hayʼatihi waḍʻan.

Incipit of al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah: "Matn ʻAwāmil. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn, wa-baʻd, fa-iʻlam annahu lā budda li-kull ṭālib maʻrifat al-iʻrāb min maʻrifat miʼat shayʼ, sittūn minhā tusammá ʻāmilan wa-thalāthūn minhā tusammá maʻmūlan wa-ʻasharah minhā tusammá ʻamalan wa-iʻrāban, fa-ubayyinu laka, bi-idhn Allāh taʻālá, hādhihi al-thalāthah ʻalá ṭarīq al-ījāz fī thalāthat abwāb: al-Bāb al-awwal fī al-ʻāmil, al-bāb al-thānī fī al-maʻmūl, al-bāb al-thālith fī al-iʻrāb ..."
Secundo folio of al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah: al-thālith fī al-iʻrāb.
Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22 cm; 33 lines per page (first treatise)
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 8 x 14 cm; 9 lines per page (the last three treatises)
Binding: Red leather binding.

In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; key words and headings in large bold script; texts within double frames; numerous interlinear notes and commentaries and on the margins of the three last treatises; catchwords.
At the upper corners of the pages of Shams al-maʻārif wa-laṭāʼif al-ʻawārif: "al-Juzʼ al-thānī. Shams al-maʻārif."

At the head of title of Iẓhār al-asrār fī al-naḥw, the date of death of Birgivî, as follows: "Tuwuffiya muṣannif kitāb al-Iẓhār wa-al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah fī Jumādá al-Ūlá sanat iḥdá wa-thamānīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [981 Hijrīyah = September/October 1573], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, kadhā fī Sharḥ al-Ṭarīqah lil-Nābulusī."

Colophon of Shams al-maʻārif wa-laṭāʼif al-ʻawārif: Colophon missing; text ends ubruptly with: "... Yā ghiyāth al-mustaghīthīn aghithnī 3, wa-irḥamnī bi-raḥmatik yā arḥam al-rāḥimīn. Allāhumma ilqi maḥabbatī fī qalb khādim hādhihi al-sūrah qad shaghafahā ḥubban yuḥibbūnahum ka-ḥubb Allāh ..."
Colophon of al-Kāfiyah: No colophon; text ends with: "... wa-al-mukhaffafah tuḥdhafu lil-sākin fī al-waqf, fayuraddu mā ḥudhifa, wa-al-maftūḥ mā qablahā tuqlabu alifan. Tammat."

Colophon of Iẓhār al-asrār fī al-naḥw: No colophon; text ends with: "... wa-hādhihi khamsat awjuh tajūzu fī amthālihi, wa-ṣfat ism lā al-mabnī al-mufradah al-muttaṣilah, fa-innahu yajūzu bināʼuhā ʻalá al-fatḥ, naḥwa lā rajula ẓarīfa wa-iʻrābuhā rafʻan wa-naṣban, naḥwa lā rajula ẓarīfun wa-ẓarīfan. Tammat."

Colophon of al-ʻAwāmil al-jadīdah: No colophon; text ends with: "... thumma al-iʻrāb in ẓahar fī al-lafẓ ysammá lafẓīyan, kamā fī al-amthilah al-madhkūrah, wa-in lam yaẓhar fī al-lafẓ bal quddira fī ākhar wa-yusammá taqdīrīyan, naḥwa anā al-ʻāṣī, wa-in lam yaẓhar wa-lam yuqaddar fī ākhirihi yusammá maḥallīyan, naḥwa tawakkalnā ʻalá man lā yaʼtī al-khayr illā min jihatih. Tammat taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ṣadr bi-Ghazwat Badr : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Shabrāwī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qādir ʻalá murādih, al-qāhir fawqa ʻibādih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi alladhīna jāhadū fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih, wa-baʻd, faqad amaranī man imtithāl amrihi ḥatm wa-ṭāʻatuhu ghunm an ajmaʻa la-hu asmāʼ al-ṣaḥābah al-Badrīyīn alladhīna ayyada Allāh bi-him al-dīn wa-ṭarafan min manāqibihim al-dāllah ʻalá ʻulw marātibihim ..."
Secundo folio: mā yaḥṣalu bi-hi min al-istiḥḍār.
Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In greenish blue cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; key words and headings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-ṣadr bi-Ghazwat Badr, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn wa-wārith ʻulūm Sayyid al-Mursalīn, al-marḥūm Mawlānā al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn bi-jāh Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Sharḥ al-ṣadr bi-Ghazwat Badr ..."
On folio 95a: "Takmilah li-man baqiya min salāṭīn Āl ʻUthmān li-Ibrāhīm al-Muṣayliḥī [could not be identified]."

On the upper left corner of folio 95a: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Nuqilat min nuskhat al-muʼallif wa-qūbilat ʻlayhā ḥasb al-ṭāqah, wa-Allāh aʻlam."

On folios 95b-96a, in a different handwriting, genealogy of the Prophet Muḥammad by al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Saqqā al-Maḥallī: "Hādhā nasab al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, jamʻ Shaykh al-Islām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Saqqā al-Maḥallī [could not be identified], raḥmahu Allāh wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn."

Author's colophon: "Yaqūlu jāmiʻuhu Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn wa-wārith ʻulūm Sayyid al-Mursalīn shaykh al-iftá [al-iftāʼ] wa-al-tadrīs bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar al-ān al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi ghāyat shahr al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat arbaʻ wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, wa-wāfaq al-farāgh min al-ziyādah allatī uḍīfat ilayhā ghāyat shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓm, sanat tisʻ wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-akmal al-taḥīyah."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The compiler of the treatise -- our Master and Lord, Shakh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn and the inheritor of the knowledge of the Lord of Messengers [Prophet Muḥammad], the head of "Fatwá" and teaching at al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar presently, al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī, may God have mercy upon him and may He benefit us and the Muslims through him. Amen -- says: 'The treatise was completed at the end of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1164 [19 November, 1751], the supplement to the treatise was completed at the end of glorious month of Ramaḍān, 1169 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [28 June, 1756], may the best of peace and greetings be upon Him'."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihā yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, thānī shahr Shaʻbān, sanat 1209, tisʻah wa-miʼatayn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The copying was completed on blessed Sunday, 2 Shaʻbān, 1209 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [22 February, 1795], may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

record.title: Amulet : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit: Starts with Sūrat al-Qadr (Qurʼan: Chapter 97): "Innā anzalnāhu fī Laylat al-Qadr ..."
Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
The central part of the amulet is written in ruqʻah/naskh script and the compartments in thulth script, in black, blue, red and gold.

record.title: Illuminated talismanic scroll : manuscript.
record.note: Incipit: Starts with the Basmalah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ..."
Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
In different scripts and styles of writing, in black, gold, silver and other colors on thick paper.

record.title: Calendar : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
In naskh/ruqʻah script in black, gold and red ink on white paper.

record.title: 880-03 al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī al-Riḍawī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-nasʼalu Allāh an yuwaffiqanā wa-īyākum ilá jannat al-naʻīm, innahu tawwāb ghafūr raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-futūwah libās al-taqwá wa-ḥullat al-anbiyāʼ, watasallaka fīhā man ikhtaṣṣahu min ʻibādihi al-awliyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Muḥammad al-muṣṭafá wa-ʻAlī al-murtaḍá wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurriyatihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ruwiya ʻan Muḥammad al-Murtaḍá ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻafá Allāh ʻan muṣannif hādhihi al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq ..."
Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: hadāka Allāh ṭarīq al-sāyirīn.
10.5 x 16.3 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12.5; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Brown leather binding.
In clear naskh ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
On folio 1a four verses of poetry about the true hero, quoted by ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Qarḥah (could not be identified).
On the margin of folio 3b a note from Muḥammad ibn Qāsim ibn ʻAlī, jadduhu ʻAlī Nūr al-Dīn Shaʻbān, dated 225 [1225 Hijrī] (1810/1811).
On the margin of folio 4a a note from ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Ḥājj Muḥammad Qāsim Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥanafī madhhaban wa-al-Kafrtakhārīmī maskanan, dated 19 Shubāṭ 220 [1220? Hijrī/1806?].

On folio 44b: "Naẓara fīhi al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-qadīr, ʻAlī ibn Nūr al-Dīn min qaṣabat Kafrat Khārīm al-tābiʻah ilá Qaḍāʼ Ḥārim."
On the margin of folio 45a: "Naẓara fīhi Muḥammad ibn Qāsim Nūr al-Dīn ... fī Jumād Thānī, thalāthat ayyām khalat, sanat 1315 [30 October, 1897]."
On folio 45b: "Naẓara fīhi Muḥammad Mghribī ibn Qāsim Nūr al-Dīn, 22 Rajab, 1308 [3 March, 1891]."
On folio 45b: A note dating the death of ʻAfūf bint al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm, on Friday night, 24 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1298 [26 March, 1881].

On folio 46a: "Naẓara fīhi ... Muṣṭafá ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Kayyālī nisbatan, Shāfiʻī madhhaban, Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, Kafrtakhārīmī maskanan wa-mawlidan. Ghafara Allāh [la-hu] wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn."
On folio 46b: "Naẓara fīhi al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ... ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Ṣabbāgh min qaṣabat Kafr Khārīm al-tābiʻah li-Qaḍāʼ Ḥārim ..."

Colophon: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, qad kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah ʻāshir yawm khalat min shahr Rajab al-mubārak min shuhūr miʼatayn wa-alf wa-thalāth wa-ʻishrīn, sanat 1223. Tamma biʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "In the name of God the Merciful, the Compassionate. May the best of prayer and the most perfect of peace be upon the most noble of the Messengers, Muḥammad, May God pray on him and give him peace. This copy was completed on the tenth of the blessed month of Rajab, the year 1223 [1 September, 1808]. Completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih wa-ghafara li-kātibihi wa-li-wālidayhi wa-man kutiba bi-ʻināyatihi, wa-lil-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt bi-faḍl suwarihi wa-āyātih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man unzila ʻlayahi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājih ..."
Secundo folio: qawlan maʻrūfan wa-qurna.
15 x 26.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 19.5; 15-16 lines per page.
Binding: In dark blue cloth binding.

In handsome naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text fully vocalized throughout; all verses are separated with rosettes in gold, silver, orange and black; all pages are ruled in several lines of silver, orange and black; all lines are separated in lines of silver, orange and black; title page is illuminated in silver and other colors; the first two leaves are highly decorated in silver, orange and other colors; divisions of the Qurʼān are marked in a large circle in the margin in silver, orange and other colors; catchwords.
Colophon: No colophon; text ends with: "... Man ʻamil ṣāliḥan fa-li-nafsih, wa-man asāʼa fa-ʻalayhā, wa-mā Rabbuka bi-ẓallāmin lil-ʻabīd, ilayhi yuraddu ʻilm al-sāʻah."

record.title: Virtues of the month of Rajab and other holy months and days with folkoloric Islamic tales : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl fī dhikr Rajab. Ruwiya ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, kāna idhā dakhala awwal shahr Rajab yaqūlu: Allāhumma bārik lanā fī Rajab wa-Shaʻbān wa-ballighnā Ramaḍān wa-aʻinnā ʻalá al-ṣiyām wa-al-qiyām ..."
Secundo folio: yuraddu fīhinna al-duʻāʼ.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17.5; 11 lines per page.
Binding: Cardboard binding with brown leather spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink on white paper, some phrases written in purple ink; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥawl Allāh."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the power of God."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ushmūnī ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume 1: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā wajjahta naḥwanā min sawābigh al-niʻam, wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā aẓharta lanā min muhimmāt al-asrār wa-muḍmarāt al-ḥikam, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā anta waḥdaka lā sharīka laka, al-fāʻil li-kull mubtadaʼ wa-mubtadiʻ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ghufrān Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, ghafara Allāh ʻuyūbahu wa-satara fī al-dārayn ʻuyūbah: Ḥawāshī sharīfah, wa-taqrīrāt jalīlah munīfah, wa-taḥqīqāt fāʼiqah, wa-tadqīqāt rāʼiqah khadamtu bi-hā sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Nūr al-Dīn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī al-Shāfiʻī ʻalá Alfīyat ibn Mālik, kull al-khidmah, wa-ṣaraftu fī taḥrīr mabānīhā wa-tahdhīb maʻānīhā jamīʻ al-himmah ..."
Secundo folio of volume 1: ḥamd Allāh wa-in lam yakun.

Incipit of volume 2: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Naʻt wa-yuqālu la-hu al-waṣf, wa-qīla al-naʻt khāṣṣ bi-mā yataghayyaru, ka-qāʼim wa-ḍārib, wa-al-waṣf wa-al-ṣiffah lā yakhtaṣṣān bi-hi, bal yashmalān, naḥwa ʻālim wa-fāḍil, wa-ʻalá al-thānī yuqālu ṣifāt Allāh wa-awṣāfuh, wa-lā yuqālu nuʻūtuh, wa-alladhī fī al-Qāmūs anna al-naʻt wa-al-waṣf maṣdarān bi-maʻná wāḥid wa-anna al-ṣifah tuṭlaqu maṣdaran bi-maʻná al-waṣf ..."
Secundo folio of volume 2: fī qillat al-māʼ bi-al-nisbah.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Light brown leather binding with flap; covers embossed with central medallion; both volumes have leather cases with flap.
In fair naskh ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a of volume 2: "Hādhā huwa al-juzʼ al-thānī min Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān ʻalá al-Ushmūnī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá."

Colophon of volume 1: Nusikha hādhā al-juzʼ min Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān al-awwal yawm al-Sabt li-khamsata ʻashar khalawna min Rajab sanat 1271, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-iḥdá wa-sabʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad kātibihā li-nafsih, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Duwaydār, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh al-masāwī wa-al-awzār, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon of volume 1: "The first volume of Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān was copied on Saturday [sic], 15 Rajab, 1271 [Tuesday, 3 April, 1855] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Duwaydār, for himself. May God forgive him and his parents their sins and shortcomings. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, His family and companions and grant them peace."

Colophon of volume 2: "Qāla khātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn Shaykhunā muʼallifuhā: Kāna al-farāgh min raqm hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah ḍaḥwat yawm al-Thulāthāʼ li-arbaʻa ʻashrata laylah maḍat min Ṣafar sanat 1193, thalāth wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad muʼallifihā al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Mawlāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, ʻāmalahumā Mawlāhumā bi-mazīd al-iḥsān. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah al-mubārakah yawm al-Aḥad, ithnay ʻashar khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī sanat 1271, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-iḥdá wa-sabʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad kātibihā li-nafsih, al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi al-qadīr, Aḥmad Duwaydār al-Shaybīnī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-raḥimahu wa-wālidayh wa-al-Muslimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-awwalīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of volume 2: "The seal of the scrutinizers, our Master, the author, said: This gloss was completed on the morning of Tuesday, 14 Ṣafar, 1193 Hijrī [3 March, 1779] by the author, the poor to the forgiveness of his Lord, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, may their Lord treat them by abundant mercy. Amen. This blessed gloss was copied on Sunday [sic], 12 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1271 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [Tuesday, 2 January, 1855], may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, by the poor Aḥmad Duwaydār al-Shaybīnī, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims and have mercy upon them. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, His family and companions and grant them peace. Amen. Amen. By the intercession of the Master of the forefathers. Amen. It is completed."

record.title: Coptic saints and martyrs hagiographies and legends : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Starts with: "... Innahu yanbaghī lī an uṣlaba wa-amūta li-ajl khalāṣ Ādam wa-dhurrīyatih wa-aqūma min al-amwāt wa-uʻṭiyakum bishārat al-Injīl al-muqaddas al-mubashshir li-tubashshirū bi-hi fī jamīʻ al-ʻālam wa-ulbisakum al-qūwah min al-ʻalāʼ wa-amlaʼakum min al-Rūḥ al-Qudus wa-tubashshirū kull al-umam bi-al-tawbah wa-ghufrān al-khaṭāyā li-anna kaʼs māʼ wāḥid idhā wajadahu al-insān fī al-dahr al-ātī aʻẓam min jamīʻ amwāl hādhā al-ʻālam kullih ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣāliḥ yafḥaṣu ʻan mīrāth al-ḥaqq.
8.5 x 13 cm; written surface: 8 x 10.5; 9-11 lines per page.
Binding: Red leather binding.
In crude and fast naskh script, in black ink on white paper.
On back cover a handwritten note in German: "Heiligenlegende, christl. in Arab. papierhs. 15 Jhrd."
On folio 78a a note by Liyās [Ilyās] ibn Naṣr.
On folio 140b another note by "Ilyās ibn Naṣr ibn Abā al-Rakb" (could not be identified) inserted between the lines of the original text to give the impression that he is the copyist.

On folio 141a another note: "Yā Rabb irḥam ʻabdaka al-khāṭiʼ Ilyās ibn Naṣr ibn Abā al-Rakb. Āmīn. Āmīn. Ayyuhā al-qāriʼ udʻū li-kātibihā bi-musāmaḥat wa-ghufrān al-khaṭyā [al-khaṭāyā]. Āmīn. Āmīn. Bi-ṣalawāt al-Qiddīs Arshalīdis al-mubārak. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Colophon (folio 165a): "Yā Rabb irḥam ʻabdaka al-khāṭiʼ [al-miskīn] kātibahā wa-sāmiḥhu yawm [al-mujāzāh] bi-shafāʻat al-qiddīsīn. Āmīn. al-Rabb yarḥamu man daʻā li-nāsikhihā bi-al-tawbah wa-ghufrān al-khaṭāyā wa-al-dhunūb. Āmīn. Wa-al-majd lillāh dāʼiman abadan. Yā Rabb."

Translation of the colophon (folio 165a): "O God have mercy on your sinner and [poor] servant, the copyist, and forgive him on the Day [of Reward], by the intercession of the saints. Amen. May God have mercy on them who beseech God to grant repentance and forgiveness of sins to the copyist. Amen. Glory be to God for ever and ever. O Lord."

record.title: Thomas Cornthwaite sermons : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Signature of Tullie Cornthwaite (1772-1839) on front pastedown.
Two sermons are dated "Mortlake Jan. 4 1753" in Cornthwaite's hand.
The sermons are preceded by a table of contents (3 pages) in a later hand.
Binding: early 19th-century with contrasting spine tag; "MSS Sermons" stamped on tag.

record.title: Notebook concerning Euclid's geometry : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Leaves numbered 1-76, rectos only, with several mistakes in numbering.
Binding: contemporary boards originally backed with calf, mostly lost.

record.title: Lectures on logic : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

Title on title page: Commentarii & disputationes in universam patris Du Triu dialecticam ad usum studiosarum Juventutis ad logicam proeparandarum dictatae a R. P. Loys rhetorices Professore. Nec non conscripta Jacobo, Josepho, De Longhe. Poperingamo in Collegio Societatis Jesu. Andomari die ja. Martii Anno Domini 1730.
Bookplate of Philippe Bragard on front pastedown.
Binding: contemporary parchment over boards.

record.title: Aboriginal Britons : a prize poem, spoken in the theatre at Oxford, July 8th, 1791 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Inscribed at the foot of the title page: Edward Mangin. Bal: Coll. 1792.
Bookplate of Edward Mangin on front pastedown.

Binding: early 19th-century plain calf. Covers with a single gilt fillet border; gilt-ruled smooth spine, lettered in gilt: Richards's Prize Poem. Binder's ticket for J. Griffiths of Bath on front pastedown.

record.title: Vindication of the character and conduct of Sir William Waller, knight : manuscript.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Annotation in the hand of James Yonge at the head of page 1: Athena Oxoniensis part 2 page 299.
Annotations in pencil on front pastedown in the hand of James Stevens-Cox.
Binding: contemporary parchment over boards, covers blind-ruled. Spine title written in a later hand: Sr. Wm. Waller's Apolog. Narrative.

record.title: Omar ibn Said letter : manuscript.
record.note: Notes on Taylor letter: "Letter from Judge Taylor - enclosing an Arabic Amulet" ; "Judge Taylor's letter and mss to be sent to Dr Stuart, Andover" ; "To the Library of the Theol. Seminary from M. Stuart, 22 April 1837." Moses Stuart was Professor of Biblical Studies at Andover Theological Seminary from 1810 to 1848.

Accompanied by a copy of The Missionary Herald (Boston: American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions, April 1869) which includes an article, in English, "Arabic-Speaking Negro Mohammedans in Africa," by George E. Post, that discusses Said's manuscript, Taylor's letter, and subsequent events and writings by Said.
Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 Selections from the Qurʼān : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15; 14 lines per page.
Binding: No binding.

In old Cufic script. The vowels are represented with red dots: Fatḥah a dot above the letter, Kasrah a dot below the letter, Ḍammah a dot on the line to the left of the letter. The verses are not numbered.

record.title: Collection of writings in Arabic and Persian : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of Qiṣaṣ al-Anbiyāʼ: "Shaykh-i buzurg az Quṭb al-Dīn Rāvandī dar kitāb-i Qiṣaṣ al-Anbiyā rivāyat kardah ast bih sanad-i khūd az Shaykh-i Ṣadūq Muḥammad ibn Bābawayh Qummī va sand-i rā muttaṣil kardāvandah bi-ḥaz̤rat-i mubayyīn al-ḥaqāʼiq Imām Jaʻfar Ṣādiq ..."
Secundo folio: Secundo folio: Chūn bisyār raʻīyah.
Colophon: No colophon exists.

2. Incipit of ʻAqd-i nikāḥ: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-al-salām ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, man kih kātib-i al-aḥruf Muḥammad ʻAlī Astarābādī am dar bāb-i ʻAqd-i nikāḥ ..."
Secundo folio: ʻaqd-i nikāḥ iḥtiyāṭ mīkunam.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... hādhihi mansūbah ilá al-Mawlá al-muḥaqqiq wa-al-fāḍil al-mudaqqiq Mawlānā Muḥammad Bāqir dāma ẓilluhu, katabahā fī ākhir risālatihi allatī ruqimat lil-ṣiyagh [li-ṣiyagh] al-ʻuqūd [ʻuqūd] al-nikāḥ, wa-jaʻaltuhā khātimatahā. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

3. Incipit of Short quotations from various religious sources: "Akthar al-qurrāʼ dhahabū ilá ann suwar al-Qurʼān miʼah wa-arbaʻah ʻashar suwar wa-ilá ann āyātihi sittat ālāf wa-sittimiʼah wa-sitt wa-sittūn āyah wa-ilá anna kalimātihi sabʻah wa-sabʻūn alfan wa-arbaʻimiʼah wa-sabʻ wa-thalāthūn kalimah wa-ilá anna ḥurūfahu thalāthmiʼah wa-ithnān wa-ʻishrūn alfan wa-sittimiʼah wa-sabʻūn ḥarfan ..."
Secundo folio: fī kitāb Salīm al-Jawāhirī.
Colophon: No colophon.
4. Incipit of Medical recipes attributed to Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Chanīn farmūdah-i Shaykh Abū al-Qāsim muḥaqqiq dar kitāb-i mukhtaṣar-i nāfiʻ ..."
Secundo folio: ʻumq aw dar z̲irāʻ.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb."

5. Incipit of Taqwīm al-muḥsinīn: "Minka al-ʻawn yā muʻīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kawwara al-layl ʻalá al-nahār wa-kawwara al-nahār ʻalá al-layl wa-jaʻalahumā khilfatan li-man arāda an yudhkar aw arāda shakūran wa-sakhkhara al-Shams wa-al-Qamar bi-amrih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa mutaʻāraf bayna al-anām.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-risālah al-sharīfah fī thānī ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī min sanat 1122 shuhūr sanat ithnā wa-ʻishrūn wa-miʼah baʻd alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah al-Muḥammadīyah ʻalayhi wa-ālihi alf al-taḥīyah wa-al-thanāʼ."

Translation of the colophon: "The writing of this noble epistle was concluded on 12 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1122 of the Hijrah of the Prophet Muḥammad, peace and praise be upon him and his family a thousand fold."

6. Incipit of Risālah fī taḥrīm dhabāʼiḥ Ahl al-Kitāb: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá ashraf al-ʻālamīn Muḥammad wa-ālih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Allāh Muḥammad al-mushtahir bi-Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī waffaqahu Allāh lil-ʻamal fī yawmihi li-ghadih qabla an yakhruja al-amr min yadih ..."
Secundo folio: li-iḥtijājihim bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu.

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah al-sharīfah al-bahāʼīyah fī yawm al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī sanat ithnā wa-ʻishrūn wa-miʼah baʻda alf [min] al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah."
Translation of the colophon: "The writing of this noble and illustrious epistle was concluded on 22 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1122 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [20 June, 1710]"
7. Incipit of Quotations from various sources: "al-Yawm al-tāsiʻ min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal kāna mawt ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-abaw fa-arsala Ṣāliḥan.
Colophon: There is no colophon for these quotations.

8. Incipit of al-Risālah al-iʻtiqādīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-mawlá al-muḥaqqiq Mawlānā Muḥammad Bāqir, mudda ẓilluhu al-ʻālī fī Risālah [al-Risālah] al-iʻtiqādīyah: Wa-yajibu ʻalayka an tuqirra bi-al-miʻrāj al-jismānī wa-annahu ʻaraja bi-badanihi ..."
Secundo folio: al-ḍaghṭah fī al-jasad al-aṣlī.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-qad awradtu al-akhbār al-wāridah fīhā fī kitāb Biḥār al-anwār wa-katabtu risālah munfaridah ayḍan fī dhālik."

9. Incipit of Risālah fī al-taqlīd: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻama fa-kafá, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá, Muḥammad al-nabī al-ummī wa-ahl baytihi dhawī al-kirām [al-karam] wa-al-wafāʼ. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ṣūrat baḥth waqaʻa li-hādhā al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-ghanī Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Ṣamad al-Jubbāʻī fī Ḥalab fī sanat iḥdá wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimiʼah ..."
Secundo folio: yaqūlu bi-al-ijtihād wa-qultu.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-ittaḍaḥat ḥaqīqat al-ḥāl wa-ṣāra min khawāṣṣ al-Shīʻah wa-lillāh al-ḥamd awwalan wa-ākhiran wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn. Tammat. MM. Tammt. M. Tammat. M.M.M ..."
10. Incipit of Tuḥfat al-zāʼir: "Faṣl Panjum az kitāb-i Tuḥfat al-zāʼir dar bayān-i kayfīyat-i ziyārat-i al-ḥaz̤rat dar ghayr Karbalā va ziyārat-i sāyir Aʼimmah, ʻalayhim al-salām ..."
Secundo folio: manqūl kih kisī kih nāḥiyah.

Colophon: "Qad tamma hādhā al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb fī tārīkh sābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Jumādá al-Awwal sanat 1122 ithnā wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah baʻda alf min Hijarah [al-Hijrah] al-Nabawīyah ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was concluded by the help of the Benevolent King on 17 Jumādá al-Awwal of the Hijrah of the Prophet [14 July, 1710], may God pray on Him and his family and give them peace.

11. Incipit of Various quotations in Persian and Arabic: "Qad thabuta bi-al-nuṣūṣ al-muʻtabarah anna Allāh taʻālá lammā akhadha min banī Ādam al-mīthāq la-hu bi-al-rubūbīyah wa-li-Muḥammad Ṣ bi-al-risālah wa-li-awṣiyāʼihi bi-al-imāmah jaʻala tilka al-mawāthīq wa-dīʻah ʻinda Ḥajar [al-Ḥajar] al-Aswad ..."
Secuno folio: dar kashf al-ghummah az Ḥaz̤rat Imām.
Colophon. There is no colophon.

12. Incipit of Arbaʻūn sūrah muntakhabah min al-Tawrāh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Nuqila ʻan al-Tawrāh arbaʻūn kalimah, wa-lil-kalimāt hādhihi fāyidah jalīlah wa-mawʻiẓah balīghah, wa-hiya arbaʻūn sūrah mintakhabah min al-Tawrāh atá kalīm Allāh taʻālá bi-hā Mūsá ibn ʻImrān bi-lā tarjumān ..."
Secundo folio: al-dunyā kayfa yaṭmaʼinnu ilayhā.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-kam min ghanī qad taraka mālahu fī al-dunyā wa-kharaja minhā ilá al-ākhirah wa-huwa faqīr ḥaqīr waḥīd min mālihi nādim ʻalá ʻamalih wa-jamʻ mālih li-wārithih wa-ashaddu al-nās ʻadhāban yawm al-qiyāmah zidnāhum ʻadhāban fawqa ʻadhāb."

13. Incipit of Various quotaions of Shīʻī content: "Fī adʻiyat al-rizq kathīrah wa-minhā mā yuqālu fī sujūd al-farḍ, maṭliʻuhu: Yā khayr al-masʼūlīn wa-yā khayr al-muʻṭīn irziqnī wa-irziq ʻiyālī min faḍlika al-wāsiʻ, innaka dhū al-faḍl al-ʻaẓīm ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ismika alladhī idhā saʼalaka.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... ibn Jaʻfar wa-ʻAlī ibn Mūsá wa-Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī wa-ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ..."
10.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 15.5 cm; lines per page vary.
Binding: Modern binding in dark blue buckram.

The Arabic text is written in naskhī script and the Persian text in nastaʻlīq script throughout, in black ink on aging white paper, with some headings, keywords and marking in red; catchwords; edges of the manuscript frayed, some leaves repaired.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī hadāhu Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fī mā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ, wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sakabathā yad al-afkār. Thumma raʼaytu kathīran min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf asrārih ..."
Secundo folio: hadāhu Allāh sawāʼ al-ṭarīq.
Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.2 x 23 cm; written surface: 7 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In red buckram binding with flap and dark brown leather spine; the codex is encased in a red buckram case with dark brown leather flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and key words in red; some corrections and notes on the margins; catchwords.

Copyist's colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqih ʻalá yad rājī luṭf mawlāhu al-ghaffār ʻabduhu wa-asīruhu al-faqīr Aḥmad Duwaydār al-Shabīnī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Ashʻarī ʻaqīdatan, al-Aḥmadīyah ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-li-ikhwānihi wa-lil-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslamāt. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min raqmihā yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak li-sittat ayyām khalat min Rajab alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thamāniyah wa-sabʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Syyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-ummī wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The copying was completed, praise be to God for His generous help, by the poor slave and captive, who hopes for the kindness of his forgiving Lord, Aḥmad Duwaydār, al-Shabīnī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Ashʻarī ʻaqīdatan, al-Aḥmadīyah ṭarīqatan, may god forgive him, his parents, his masters, his brethren, and Muslim men and women. It was completed on blessed Monday, 6 Rajab, 1278 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [7 January, 1862], may the best of prayer and peace be upon him. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the illiterate prophet, and upon his family and companions and give them peace.

record.title: 880-02 Manẓūmah fī al-buyūʻ : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Munayyir.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-bismillāh thumma ṣalātihi // wa-taslīmihi aʻnī li-Khayri al-Barīyati. Wa-baʻdu fa-inna al-bayʻa yakthur wuqūʻuhu // wa-fīhi fasādun wāqiʻun fī al-khalīqati ..."
Secundo folio: kadhālika niṣfu sayfin.
16.5 x 23.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red dots at the beginning, middle and end of the verses; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a, in a different hand: "Hādhihi manẓūmah lil-ʻĀrif bi-Rabbihi Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Munayyirī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hā ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 1a, an ownership note: "Mulk al-faqīr Ibrāhīm Ḥusayn al-Munayyirī, ʻufiya ʻanh."
On folio 4a, a seal in the name of: "ʻAduh Ḥusayn al-Munayyirī."
Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah, wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy has ended. God is more knowledgeable. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and give them peace."

record.title: 880-02 Wird al-aqṭāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Wird al-aqṭāb. Dhakar al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn annahu wird al-aqṭāb wa-al-mukammalīn min aṣḥāb al-dawāyin [al-dawāthir] al-kubrá, dhakartuhu lil-ikhwān rajāʼ al-ʻamal bi-hi, wa-dhakartu fī akhir kull dhikr baʻḍ mā yuntijuhu min al-aḥwāl al-bāṭinah, wa-Allāh yanfaʻu man yashāʼ, innahu samīʻ mujīb. Wa-yashtamilu hādhā al-wird ʻalá khamsah wa-ʻishrīn ṣifah min al-dhikr."
Secundo folio: al-takhalluq bi-ṣifāt al-ṣāliḥīn.
16.5 x 23.2 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a, in a different hand: "Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Wird al-aqṭāb lil-Imām al-Quṭb Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī."

On folio 1a, two ownership notes, as follows: "Mulk al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Khalīl al-ʻUbaydī [?] baladan, al-Rāziqī nasaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, ghufira la-hu wa-li-wālidayh." "Thumma intaqala ilá mulk al-faqīr Aḥmad al-ʻInānī."

At the end of folio 4a, a title of another book on the ceremony of sufi initiation "lubs al-khirqah" (wearing of the rag) by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī: "Kitāb al-Qawl al-mubīn li-dalīl lubs al-khirqah wa-al-talqīn, taʼlīf al-Quṭb al-Rabbānī Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, ʻammat barakatuhu. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 4b an illegible invocation, in sixteen verses, written in a different hand, against "al-rīḥ al-aḥmar" ("red wind", some kind of demonic possession): "Ṣifat duʻāʼ sharīf lil-rīḥ al-aḥmar. Wa-hādhā huwa al-duʻāʼ, fa-yuktab wa-yuqraʼ wa-yuʻallaq wa-yuqraʼ."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak li-thalāth layālin baqiyat min shahr al-Ḥijjah, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-sittah wa-thamānīn 1186 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, aḥsana Allāh khitāmahā bi-jāh [Khayr] al-Barīyah. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was concluded on Saturday, three nights remaining from the month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1186 of the Hijrah [21 March, 1773], may God end it well by the intercession of the Prophet Muḥammad. Amen. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Manẓūmah Lāmīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Brīyah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-ḍāllīn al-muḍillīn. Ilá matá anta billādhāti mashghūlu // wa-anta ʻan kulli mā qaddamta masʼūlu. Fī kulli yawmin turajjī an tatūba ghadan // wa-ʻiqdu ʻazmika bittaswīfi makhlūlu ..."
Secundo folio: Muḥammadun ḥujjat Allāh.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Manẓūmah Lāmīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Barīyah ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-hiya miʼatā bayt wa-arbaʻah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-hiya lil-Shaykh al-Būṣīrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Āmīn."
At the head of folio 1a, an endowment statement: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá."
On folio 5b, nine verses from "al-Munfarijah" of Ibn al-Naḥwī, Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1041-1119 or 1120: "Ishtadī azmatu tanfarijī // qad ādhana layluki bi-al-faraji ..."
Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Āmīn."
Translation of the colophon: "It is concluded by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah fī madḥ Ashraf al-Barīyah : manuscript / al-Sirāj al-Warrāq, Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām muʼallif al-Witrīyah [... ...] Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Rashīd al-Baghdādī al-wāʻiẓ, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻannā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala baʻḍ al-nabīyīn ʻalá baʻḍ wa-rafaʻa baʻḍahum fawqa baʻḍ darajāt, fa-ātá Ādam al-ṣafwah wa-Ibrāhīm al-khillah wa-Mūsá tisʻ āyāt bayyināt wa-baʻatha ʻĪsá bi-ibrāʼ al-akmah wa-al-abraṣ wa-aḥyá ʻalá yadayhi al-amwāt ..."
Secundo folio: lī maʻahum qadaman.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within double red frame; fully vocalized; many wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a an ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb huwa Takhmīs al-Qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah fī madḥ ashraf al-barīyah, mulk al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-faqīr Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī, al-muʻtarif bi-al-taqṣīr, dakhala fī mulkihi fī 18 Rajab al-fard sanat 1295 [18 July, 1878], khamsah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf Hijrīyah min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-mushtarāhu fī al-tārīkh al-madhkūr min al-Shaykh Maḥmūd ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Zamak bi-mablagh qadruhu AY [?] taʻrīfah [currency unit], kamā al-waṣl al-maʼkhūdh ʻalá al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-madhkūr bi-khaṭṭ yadihi jamīʻuhu wa-maḥfūẓ bi-ṭaraf al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī al-mushtarī. Kātibuhu Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī al-Faqīh."

On folio 3a-3b: "Qāla al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-Sirāj al-Warrāq mukhammis al-Witrīyah: Ammā baʻd fa-innī raʼaytu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-manām yaṭūfu bi-al-Bayt fa-ṭuftu warāʼahu ḥattá intahá ilá al-Rukn al-Yamānī ..."

The quintuplicate of al-Sirāj al-Warrāq starts with: "Badaʼtu bi-dhikri Allāh madḥan muqaddaman. Wa-uthnī bi-ḥamdi Allāh shukran muʻaẓẓaman. Wa-akhtumu qawlī bi-al-ṣalāti wa-innamā. Uṣallī ṣalātan tamlaʼu al-arḍa wa-al-samā // ʻalá man la-hu aʻlā al-ʻulā mutabawwaʼu."
The quintuplicate ends with: "Yamīnan bi-Rabbī inna qalbī yuḥibbuhu // wa-dhāka rajāʼī fī al-mamāti wa-fī al-maḥyā."

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr Aḥmad Yūsuf al-Samānūdī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Tamm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Āmīn. Taḥrīran dhālika yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, thālith ʻishrīn Rabīʻ Ākhir, sanat 1226 min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-ʻaẓẓama wa-karram."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy is completed by the praise of God, His help and His benevolence, by the copyist, the poor Aḥmad Yūsuf al-Samānūdī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, may God forgive him, his parents, his masters and all Muslims. It is completed. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. Written on blessed Thursday, 23 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1226 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [17 May, 1811] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ism Allāh al-aʻẓam : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil wa-al-niḥrīr al-kāmil, shaykh al-sharīʻah wa-al-ḥaqīqah, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Mūsá al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī, mā naṣṣuhu: Ittafaqa al-muʻtaddu bi-ittifāqihim anna al-ism al-aʻẓam ʻArabī, bal ḥaká baʻḍuhum al-ijmāʻ ʻalá dhālik wa-ikhtalafū baʻda dhālika fī taʻyīnihi wa-ʻadam taʻyīnih ʻalá qawlayn. al-Qawl al-awwal anna al-ism al-aʻẓam wāḥid bi-ʻaynih, ay ism mutaʻayyan laysa dāʼiran fī sāʼir al-asmāʼ. Wa-ajmaʻa ahl hādhā al-qawl annahu aḥada ʻashara ḥarfan ..."
Secundo folio: tawāfuqihim fī al-asmāʼ.
16.5 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some keywords and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a are scribbled three verses of poetry in poor style, incorrect rhythm and some structural and grammatical mistakes.

On folio 4b are written in a different hand four quintuplicates attributed to Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Miṣrī (could not be identified) which start with: "Yā jamālan mā mithluhu min shabīh // kullu khayrin yurjá li-man tajtabīh ...", and an incantation against ants attributed to al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Rifāʻī (could not be identified).
Colophon: "Intahá bi-ḥurūfihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Translation of the colophon: "The copying is completed. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, His family and companions and give them peace."

record.title: 880-03 Masāʼil Ibn Hishām : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh musbigh al-ʻaṭāʼ, musbil al-ghiṭāʼ, muʻṭī al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, al-maḥmūd ʻalá al-sarrāʼ wa-al-ḍarrāʼ, al-mashkūr fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ, aḥmaduhu wa-lā maḥmūd ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah siwāh, wa-ashkuruhu shukran lā yaʼbāh wa-lā yansāh, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī min khayr al-ʻanāṣir iṣṭafāh ..."
Secundo folio: fīhā wa-yatakhāṣamūn bi-hā.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Masāʼil Ibn Hishām."
On folio 2a: "Hādhihi Masāʼil Ibn Hishām fī alghāzih ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 3a: "... wa-jaʻaltuhu bi-rasm al-khizānah al-mawlawīyah al-sulṭānīyah al-malakīyh al-Kāmilīyah, adām Allāh mulk mālikihā ..."
On folios 1a-2a: Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes and grammatical riddles and parsing.
Text folios 2b-21b.
On folios 22a-27b, in a different hand: Various grammatical rules.
Folio 28 is blank.
On folios 29a-40b, in a different hand: Various quotations, poems, anecdotes, advices, tales and prayers.
Colophon (folio 21b): "Tammat al-Alghāz bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih wa-karamih."
Translation of the colophon: "The Riddles are completed by the praise of God and His benevolence and generosity."

record.title: 880-03 Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr al-Tilimsānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 1b): "Hādhā kitāb mukhtaṣar min Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāh, innī asʼaluka al-iʻānah ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qāla Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr // mubtadiʼan bi-bismi al-ilāh al-qadīri. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi alladhī ʻallamanā // sirra al-kunūzi wa-bihi awlānā ... Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Durrati al-anwāri // taḥqīqun fī ṣanāyiʻi al-abrāri ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Durrati al-anwāri.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions, in four numbered quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many commentaries and corrections on the margins; magic squares; text within double red frames; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb mukhtaṣar min Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk musammiyan [musammá] bi-Durrat al-anwār lil-fāḍil Ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr al-Tilimsānī, wa-huwa ʻumdah fī al-funūn al-maʻdūmah, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn."
On folio 1a: A medical snuff recipe for those afflicted with the spirits of the rebellious Jinn: "Ṣifat saʻūṭ lil-muṣāb bi-aryāḥ al-jān al-mutamarridīn ..."
On the margin of folio 136b, a coallation note: "Balaghah muqābalatan bi-ghāyat al-diqqah ʻalá yadinā. Kātibuhu al-faqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khawjah."
On folios 137a and 138a-138b, medico-magical recipes, in a different hand.

Colophon (folio 136b): "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak al-muwāfiq 4 arbaʻah khalat min shahr Jumād Awwal, sanat 1007 [?] alf wa-sabʻ sinīn [?] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-adhká [wa-azká] al-taḥīyah wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāyiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. ʻAlá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh ʻAlī ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ilá Allāh tarjiʻ al-umūr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was concluded on blessed Monday, 4 Jumād Awwal, 1007 [?] of the Hijrah of the Prophet ... Copied by ... ʻAlī ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī al-Zabīdī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jazīl ʻawāʼidihi ḥamdan yuwāfī mā ajzala min niʻamihi wa-fawāʼidih wa-yukāfī mā yafḍulu bi-hi min zawāʼidihi wa-ṣilātih, wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān min aʻlam shawāhidih wa-dīn al-Islām min taʼsīsih wa-qawāʻidih, ṣallātan taʻummu ajmaʻa ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-wāfidih ..."
Secundo folio: jawwidʹhā fa-ghufira lah.
15.3 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10.8 x 15.7 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions.
In medium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; many magic squares; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb Fawāʼid fīhi majmūʻah."
On folio 84b: "Tamma Kitāb al-Fawāʼid wa-al-ṣalawāt, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá."
Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad kātibihi Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. M. Sanat 1157."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was concluded by the praise of God, His help and abundant benevolence. Copied by the poor Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad in the year 1157 Hijrīyah [1744 or 1745]. May God forgive the copyist and all Muslims."

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālat al-Qushayrīyah fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-qaṣīr ... Ammā baʻd, fahādhihi risālah katabahā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, raḥimahu Allāh, bi-balad Dār al-Salām, fī sanat 437. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad jaʻala Allāh taʻālá hādhihi al-ṭāʼifah ṣafwatan wa-faḍḍlahum ʻalá kathīr min al-nās baʻda rusulihi wa-anbiyāʼihi, ṣalāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: mā yazwī wa-yadfaʻ.
10.3 x 15 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers and flap embossed with central medallions.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālat al-Shaykh al-ʻārif al-kāmil al-muḥaqqiq ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-ḥasharanā maʻahu fī dār karāmatih bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. M."

On folio 1a are written titles of three works as follows: Risālat al-tajrīd [fī] kalimat al-tawḥīd li-Aḥmad al-Ghazzālī (Ghazzālī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, died 1126). Risālah Tāʼīyah al-Shaykh [Ibn] Ḥabīb al-Ṣafadī (Ṣafadī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad, died 1509 or 1510). Tāʼīyat al-ʻUlaymī (could not be identified)."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-idhā quriʼa al-Qurʼān fa-istamiʻū la-hu wa-anṣitū. Wa-qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Wa-khashiʻat al-aṣwāt lil-Raḥmān fa-lā tusmaʻu illā hamsan'. Wa-kam bayna ʻabdin yaskutu taṣāwunan ʻan al-kadhib wa-al-ghaybah wa-bayna ʻabdin yaskutu li-istīlāʼ sulṭān ..."

record.title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, khalaqtanā wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhūḍu al-ʻaql fī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā taṭwī taḥta jināhā, walāsīmā wa-qad ashāra bi-hi ʻalayya Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: Muḥammad wa-anbiyāʼihi wa-huwa ḥasbī.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap, covers and flap embossed with central medallions.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd" of ʻAlī al-Najjārī in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; text within double red frames.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Futūḥāt al-Rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd lil-Shaykh al-Damanhūrī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-nabī al-ummī wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
On folio 1b: "Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd."

On folio 2b is given the full name of ʻAlī al-Najjārī, the teacher of the author, Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī, as follows: "... ʻAlī ism al-nāẓim, ibn ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-madʻū, yaʻnī al-mashhūr bi-al-Najjārī, nisbatan li-baldat Kawm al-Najjār bi-Wilāyat al-Minūfīyah min aʻmāl al-Najjārīyah ..."

On the margin of folio 98a: "Qāla al-muʼallif: 'Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tabyīḍ muʻẓam hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak fī Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thamān wa-ʻishrīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man tabiʻahum fī al-mabdaʼ wa-al-khitām'. Qawluhu "muʻẓam", innamā qāla dhālika li-anna al-muʼallif lam yubayyiḍ khātimat al-taṣawwuf illā fī al-sanah allatī talī al-thāminah wa-al-ʻishrīn."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, sabʻat ayyām khalat min Shaʻbān, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻah wa-arbaʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm, ʻalá yad kātibihā li-nafsihi al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Bārī Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-madʻū al-Najjārī."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Thursday, 7 Shaʻbān, 1249 [20 December, 1833] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, copied for himself, by the poor to the forgiveness of the Creator, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-madʻū al-Najjārī."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih wa-thabuta karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá dhubdat [zubdat] makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yaqtaniʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī, wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."
Secundo folio: ithbāt al-waḥdānīyah lil-dhāt al-ṣamadānīyah.
14 x 20 cm; written surface: 10.2 x 14.5 cm; 19-21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; text within double frames; catchwords.
Text folios 1b-44b; folios 45-46 are blank.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... fa-nasʼalu Allāh subḥānahu wa-taʻālá an yarḥama al-nāẓim wa-jamīʻ mashāyikhinā al-kirām wa-ābaʼanā wa-aslāfanā al-fikhām wa-an yakhtima lanā wa-li-aḥbābinā bi-al-ḥusná wa-an yarziqanā al-maqām al-asná maʻa al-nabīyīn wa-al-shuhadāʼ wa-al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-nabī al-ummī wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá yawm al-dīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-munfarid ʻan al-ṣāḥibah wa-al-walad, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá man ikhtārahu Allāh ḥabīban min al-abad, Muḥammad al-mukhtār dhī al-faḍl wa-al-madad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā tanaffasa mutanaffis ilá al-abad. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr al-munʻim al-mannān ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah al-Ustādh al-aʻẓam al-Shaykh Shiḥādhah al-ʻIrāqī, taghammadahum Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih wa-askanahum fasīḥ jinānih: Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá risālat al-Shaykh al-Imām Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Maydānī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá, jaʻaltuhu tadhkirah li-abnāʼ jinsī wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah, wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlih an yanfaʻanī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: li-annahu awwal qabla kull shayʼ
15 x 20.2 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of Risālat al-Shykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Maydānī and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf yusammá al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah li-Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah al-Shaykh Shiḥādhah al-ʻIrāqī, ʻalá risālat al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Maydānī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá."
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous Ḥadiths, in a different hand.
Colophon: "Tammat al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
Translation of the colophon: "al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. God suffices us. He is the best advocate."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Ḥamdan li-man abdaʻa al-uṣūl wa-al-muwalladāt wa-ikhtāra minhā dhawī al-rawīyah wa-al-ʻuqūl al-bāhirāt, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá aṣl al-nashʼatayn wa-khulāṣat man ātāhu Allāh al-ḥikmatayn, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-mutamassikīn bi-millatihi wa-al-ʻāmilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥqar al-anām Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ṭahharahu Allāh min waṣmat al-anām: Hādhihi masāʼil muzdariyah jalīlah tataʻallaqu bi-ʻilāj al-maqʻadah al-ʻalīlah bi-adwiyah shahīrah kathīrat al-wujūd, qarībat al-taḥṣīl li-kull faqīr wa-ghanī kanūd, sammaytuhā bi-al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá muqaddimah wa-maqṣūd wa-khātimah, rājiyan minhu subḥānah an yamunna ʻalaynā bi-ḥusn al-khātimah ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻaḍalatayn mublighān ilá aṣl.
17 x 24.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālah fī ʻilāj al-maqʻdah wa-al-bawāsīr lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn."
On folio 13a, in a different hand: "Fāʼidah lil-bawāsīr" (a medical recipe for the treatment of hemorrhoids).
Folio 14 is blank.

Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi fī al-ʻāshir min al-sābiʻ min al-tāsiʻ min al-sābiʻ min al-thānī ʻashar min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīdihi yawm al-Jumʻah rābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhur sanat alf wa-miʼah arbaʻah wa-tisʻīn min al-Hijrah. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih yawm al-Aḥad, ghurrat shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1298. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "The author said: It was completed on the tenth of the seventh of the ninth of the seventh of the twelfth of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon him [10 Rajab, 1169 Hijrī = 10 April, 1756]. Its drafting "taswīd" was completed on Friday [sic], 14 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1194 of the Hijrah [Monday, 20 March, 1780]. The copy was completed, by the praise of God, His help and abundant benevolence, on Sunday, the beginning of Ṣafar, 1298 [3 January, 1881]. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā ʻallamtanā min farāʼid ʻaqāʼid al-īmān wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā alhamtanā min sāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-qawāṭiʻ al-burhān, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallim ʻalá man ʻaṣamtahu min al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-hādīn ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḥāmīn sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūl afqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat al-karīm al-jawwād Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī, ʻāmalahu Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā kāna ʻilm al-tawḥīd awwal wājib ʻalá al-mukallaf fahman lā yaṣiḥḥu wājib wa-lā mandūb bi-dūnih jazman, wa-kānat manẓūmat Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Najjārī min ajall mā ṣunnifa fīhi nafʻan li-mā annahā qad ishtamalat maʻa wajāzat lafẓihā wa-suhūlat tanāwulihā ʻalá al-ʻaqāʼid murdafah bi-adillatihā jamʻan, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī la-hā ghāyat al-inshirāḥ, fa-sharaʻtu fī taʼlīf sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalayhā, mustaʻīnan bi-al-ʻAlīm al-Fattāḥ, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-sammaytuhu "Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: kathīr al-dumūʻ al-gharaḍ.
16.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 19 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd" of ʻAlī al-Najjārī in red; numerous notes, commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Four verses of poetry by Muḥammad al-Ṭanṭāwī (could not be identified) in praise of "Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd" of ʻAlī ibn ʻĪsá al-Najjārī and the commentary on it by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīf hādhā al-sharḥ al-nafīs sanat alf wa-miʼatayn sabʻah wa-thalāthīn min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Tamm. ʻAlá yad kātibihi wa-muʼallifihi al-faqīr Aḥmad Qashsh al-Faraqī al-Zakī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This precious commentary was completed in the year 1237 [1821 or 1822] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may God pray on him and grant him peace. Written and authored by the poor Aḥmad Qashsh al-Faraqī al-Zakī, may God have mercy upon him. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa shams al-fawāʼid fī muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-jaʻala niẓām al-qalāʼid fī musāmarat al-akhyār wa-awdaʻa li-laʼāliʼ [laʼāliʼ] al-fawāʼid fī muḥāwarat al-aḥrār, wa-awḍaḥa al-ḥikam fī mujārāt al-ḥukamāʼ, wa-abāna jawāmiʻ al-kalim fī mubārāt al-ʻulamāʼ, wa-ḍammana al-asrār fī muṭāraḥat al-aḥibāʼ, wa-arsala al-arwāḥ fī munāwaḥat al-awiddāʼ, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī awdaʻtu fī hādhā al-kitāb alladhī sammaytuhu "Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār" ḍurūban min al-akhbār wa-funūnan min al-mawāʻiẓ wa-al-amthāl dhawī al-albāb ..."
Secundo folio: dhālika ḥattá tatawaffara ḥurmatuh.
13.5 x 21.8 cm; written surface: 7 x 16.5 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā dīwān li-Ibn al-ʻArab [al-ʻArabī], wa-huwa jāmiʻ min kull fann, shiʻr wa-ḥikāyāt muḍḥikah musallīyah, wa-aḥādīth wa-nukat wa-musāmarāt wa-tawārīkh al-khulafāʼ wa-ʻajāʼib al-ṣunʻ wa-badāʼiʻ al-ḥikmah wa-ghayr [wa-ghayruhu] kathīr. Wa-naḥnu iqtaṣarnā. Wa-fīhi ghayr dhālika min al-ʻajāʼib. Sanat 1110."
Text folios 1b-82b; folios 83-84 are blank.

Colophon: "Intahá wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, lā sharīka lah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammadan [Muḥammad] wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurrīyātihi wa-azwājihi wa-ahl baytihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. M."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. Praise be to God alone. He has no companion. Prayer and peace be on our Master Muḥammad, his family, his companions, his descendants, his wives, and those of his household, the good and the pure ones. Praise be to God alone. M."

record.title: 880-03 al-Taysīr li-ḥifẓ madhāhib al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah : manuscript / Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd al-Dānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 2b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām Abū ʻAmr al-ḥāfiẓ ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān al-Muqriʼ ibn ʻUmar al-Ṣayriafī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-dawām, al-mutaṭawwil bi-al-inʻām, khāliq al-khalq bi-qudratih, wa-mudabbir al-amr bi-ḥikmatih, lā rādda li-amrih, wa-lā muʻaqqiba li-ḥukmih, wa-huwa sarīʻ al-ḥisāb ... Ammā baʻd, fa-innakum saʼaltumūnī, aḥsana Allāh irshādakum, an uṣannif lakum kitāban mukhtaṣaran fī madhāhib al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-amṣār ... fa-ajabtukum ilá mā saʼaltumūhu wa-aʻmaltu nafsī fī taṣnīf mā raghibtumūhu ʻalá al-naḥw alladhī aradtumūh ..."
Secundo folio: fī qurb wa-dhakartu.
15 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram binding with flap and red leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: A note, in a different hand about, "al-Ḥurūf al-muqaṭṭaʻah" (Separate letters at the beginning of some sūrahs of the Qurʼān) and about "madd" ("elongation": drawing out of the voice over long vowels in the recitation of the Qurʼān).

On folio 2a: "Kitāb al-Taysīr li-ḥfẓ madhāhib al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah, raḥimahum Allāh, wa-taqrīb wa-tabyīn dhālika ʻalá al-mashhūr ʻanhum min al-ṭuruq wa-al-riwāyāt, maʻa ḥadhf al-taṭwīl wa-al-takrār, wa-al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ījāz wa-al-ikhtiṣār, taṣnīf Abī ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUmar al-Muqrī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, riwāyat Abī Dāwūd Sulaymān ibn Abī al-Qāsim Najāḥ, mawlá Amīr al-Muʼminīn, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih."
On folios 95b-96a, a commentary, in a different hand, on "Āyat al-Riddah" (the apostasy verse. Qurʼān: Sūrat al-Baqarah: 217)
Folios 97-98 are blank.

Colophon (folio 95b): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi [kitābat] hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak al-musammá bi-Taysīr [al-Taysīr], yassara Allāh ʻalaynā amranā fī al-dunyā wa-Yawm al-Dīn, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá al-ghanī ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh fī Ḥalab al-Shahbāʼ, fī Madrasat al-Aḥmadīyah, wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Khamīs min shuhūr sanat 1189 min Hijrat man ʻalayhi alf salām wa-alf taḥīyah. Wa-arjū min al-khillān an yuṣliḥū mā fīhā min al-ʻayb wa-al-nuqṣān."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this blessed book, titled "al-Taysīr", may God facilitate our condition in this world and on Judgement Day, was completed by the poor to God, the Rich and Most High, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh, on blessed Thursday, 1189 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1175 or 1176; date of the day and name of the month not mentioned] at al-Madrasah al-Aḥmadīyah, in Aleppo, Syria. I request my colleagues to correct whatever defects or shortcomings they may find in it."

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī.
record.note: Title of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼiyah from folio 1a.
Title of Mawlid al-Nabī supplied by cataloger.
Title of al-Dimyāṭīyah from caption (folio 40b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh, mūḍiḥ al-ṭarīqah wa-mumidd masālik al-ḥaqīqah Tāj al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh: Min ʻalāmāt al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd maʻa iqāmat Allāh iyyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh iyyāka fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."
Secundo folio of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: lā yakun taʼakhkhur.

Incipit of Mawlid al-Nabī (folio 27b): "Hādhā al-Mawlid li-baʻḍ al-muḥaqqiqīn, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa al-anām bi-ṣāḥib al-maqām al-aʻlá, wa-kammal al-wujūd bi-akmal mawlūd ḥawá sharafan wa-faḍlan, sharrafa bi-hi al-ābāʼ wa-al-judūd, wa-malaʼ al-wujūd bi-hi ʻadlan. Ḥamilat bi-hi ummuhu Āminah, fa-lam tajid li-ḥamlihi thiqalan, wa-waḍaʻathu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, makhtūnan madhūnan fī khilaʻ al-ḥusn yuḥlá, wa-wulida, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-wajh lā yurá aḥsana minhu wa-lā aḥlá ..."
Secundo folio of Mawlid al-Nabī: wa-nārat bi-hi al-akwān.
Incipit of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "Hādhihi al-Dimyāṭīyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-Bismillāhi wa-al-ḥamdi awwalan // ʻalá niʻamin lam tuḥṣa fīmā tanazzala ..."
Secundo folio of al-Dimyāṭīyah: Wa-yā qābiḍu iqbiḍ.
13.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Ḥikam lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Tāj al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī al-Shādhilī, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu wa-nafaʻanā Allāh bi-ʻulūmihi wa-al-Muslimīn fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn."
On the right margin of folio 42b, someone wrote three verses of poetry as a supplement to the verses of al-Dimyāṭīyah.

Colophon of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "Tammat al-Ḥikam bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam wa-ʻaẓẓam, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-Shahīr bi-al-Habrāwī, sanat 1112."

Translation of the colophon of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "The copy of al-Ḥikam was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant favor. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace and glory. Copied by the poor faqī ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-Shahīr bi-al-Habrāwī, in the year 1112 Hijrī [1700 or 1701]."
Colophon of Mawlid al-Nabī: "ʻAlá yad kātibihā al-marqūm, sanat 1112."
Translation of the colophon of Mawlid al-Nabī: "The copy was completed by the hand of the aforementioned copyist, in the year 1112 Hijrī [1700 or 1701]."

Colophon of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "Biʻawn Allāh taʻālá tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat. Katabahā li-nafsihi, wa-liman shāʼa Allāh min baʻdih, ʻUbayd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Habrah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-liman daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah wa-dhālika ẓuhrīyat nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ li-sittata ʻashar yawman maḍat min shahr Ṣafar al-khayr min shuhūr sanat 1112."

Translation of the colophon of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "It [the copy] was completed by the help of God, may He be praised. May it be wide-spread. Copied by ʻUbayd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Habrah, may God forgive him and his parents and whosoever beseech God to forgive them, on Wednesday noon, 16 Ṣafar, 1112 Hijrī [2 August, 1700]."

record.title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshada hādhihi al-ummah ilá ādāb lā tuḥṣá, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-faḍāʼil wa-mazāyā lā tustaqṣá, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata ʻabd muḥtāj ilá fayḍ ʻAllām al-Ghuyūb, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ajall ṭālib wa-maṭlūb, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, mā ṭalaʻa najm wa-afila gharūb. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-multajī ilá karam al-Raʼūf al-Laṭīf, Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharra al-munāwī wa-al-muʻādī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm ilá maʻrifat ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jimāʻ ..."
Secundo folio: al-awwal fī ādābihi al-sharʻīyah.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Folio 81 is blank.
Text folios 1b-80a.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq wa-al-hādī ilá al-ṣawāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, sayyid al-aḥbāb, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-atbāʻ wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man ikhtaṣṣanā bi-risālat Abī al-Qāsim, wa-ikhtaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá yawm al-hawl, al-ʻāṣim mā ashfaqat al-umm ʻalá waladihā al-bārr al-rāḥim ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá al-ghfrān ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī al-Shāfiʻī ... Lammā an manna Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-ijtimāʻ ʻalá ...
